content: Hoho, Yunguo's still waiting for you to join her in finding "<style=Highlight>sproutsies</style>." If you're not sure where to go, check the <style=Highlight>Map</style> for clues.
info: 访客云果-莫白闲聊_主流程文本

content: When I was learning to cultivate tea plants from a friend, I stayed for a while near Yunguo's grandmother's home at the foot of the mountain. I'm truly grateful for the kindness she showed me back then.
info: 访客云果-莫白闲聊_主流程文本

content: I never imagined that brief encounter would lead to your meeting today. It's my pleasure to have helped bring this about.
info: 访客云果-莫白闲聊_主流程文本
